game.name: Remorses
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Investigate the infamous Westbrook Mansion in 1991, deep within the Lakota Territory forests. Learn terrifying witchcraft and uncover its secrets. Sanity? Open windows, or lose it.
